pkgmetadata.longdescription: Distance-Based k-Medoids // A simple and fast distance-based k-medoids clustering algorithm from Park and Jun (2009) doi:10.1016/j.eswa.2008.01.039. Calculate distances for mixed variable data such as Gower (1971) doi:10.2307/2528823, Wishart (2003) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-55721-7_23, Podani (1999) doi:10.2307/1224438, Huang (1997) http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/ viewdoc/download?doi=10.1.1.94.9984rep=rep1type=pdf, and Harikumar and PV (2015) doi:10.1016/j.procs.2015.10.077. Cluster validation applies bootstrap procedure producing a heatmap with a flexible reordering matrix algorithm such as complete, ward, or average linkages.
